item.title: Boredom, Books & Bugs
item.description: With millions of people stuck at home during the COVID-19 crisis, many explored various new hobbies to keep With millions of people stuck at home during the COVID-19 crisis, many explored various new hobbies to keep themselves occupied and ensure that they are not unduly stressed. According to a survey by The Healthy Work Company, a workplace mental health consultancy, 22% of respondents had taken up a new pastime in lockdown, while 35% had rediscovered an old one.
